instructions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line 9x5 inch loaf pan with plastic wrap, with edges hanging over for easier pickup. Line a rimmed baking sheet with foil.
instructions.2: Combine ground beef, onion, garlic, salt, pepper and crushed Cheerios™ in a mixing bowl. Mix until well combined but do not overwork.
instructions.3: Place half of the meat mixture in prepared loaf pan. Press mixture into all corners and up the sides leaving a trough in the center for the cheese. Sprinkle in the cheese; place remaining meat mixture on top. Press well to seal cheese inside meatloaf. Turn out meatloaf onto foil-lined baking sheet; double check to make sure cheese is sealed inside.
instructions.4: Bake until internal temperature is 165 degrees, about 2 hours. Allow to rest 10 minutes before slicing.

questions.question: Is meat mixture from Step 3 still available in Step 4?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 4?
Can we place (Step 3) and bake (Step 4) at the same time?
